properties.value: The snow globe is obtained as a reward from the 2016 Christmas event, as well as subsequent Christmas events. If destroyed, players can obtain a replacement from Diango in Draynor Village. Its design is based off the original snowglobe obtained from the 2007 Christmas event, in which players obtained a snowglobe with a replica of Lumbridge Castle inside it. The snow globe is obtained as a reward from the 2016 Christmas event, as well as subsequent Christmas events. If destroyed, players can obtain a replacement from Diango in Draynor Village. Its design is based off the original snowglobe obtained from the 2007 Christmas event, in which players obtained a snowglobe with a replica of Lumbridge Castle inside it. When shaken, the snowglobe would play a softer version of the song Harmony, create a pile of snow, and fill the player's inventory with snow.

This item can be stored in the toy box of a costume room.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • A player using the Snow option on a snow globe.

  • The image that appears after using the Shake option on a snow globe.

[[File:Snow globe detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''snow globe''' is obtained as a reward from the [[2016 Christmas event]], as well as subsequent Christmas events. If destroyed, players can obtain a replacement from [[Diango]] in [[Draynor Village]]. Its design is based off the original snowglobe obtained from the [[2007]] Christmas event, in which players obtained a snowglobe with a replica of [[Lumbridge Castle]] inside it. When shaken, the snowglobe would play a softer version of the song [[Harmony (music track)|Harmony]], create a pile of [[snow]], and fill the player's inventory with [[snow]].

{{Costume storage|toy box}}
